welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Guapiles, Costa Rica! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city, known for its lush nature and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Guapiles has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rio Frio Airport is responsible for handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport handles both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves flights within Costa Rica.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
